mapper.select: SELECT STYLE_NO, STYLE_TAG, STYLE_CONTENT,COUNT, "LIKE", STYLE_WRITER, FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME TITLE_IMG, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "CREATE_DATE" FROM STYLE S JOIN ATTACHMENT ON(STYLE_NO = REF_NO) WHERE S.STATUS = 'Y' AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND TYPE_NO = 3 ORDER BY STYLE_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STYLE (STYLE_NO, STYLE_TAG, STYLE_CONTENT, STYLE_WRITER) VALUES(SEQ_SNO.NEXTVAL, #{styleTag}, #{styleContent}, #{styleWriter})

INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT (FILE_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL, REF_NO, TYPE_NO) VALUES (SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{filePath}, #{fileLevel}, SEQ_SNO.CURRVAL, 3)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STYLE WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT STYLE_NO, STYLE_TAG, STYLE_CONTENT,STATUS, COUNT, "LIKE", CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, STYLE_WRITER FROM STYLE WHERE STYLE_NO = #{sno} AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL FROM STYLE JOIN ATTACHMENT ON (REF_NO = STYLE_NO) WHERE REF_NO = #{sno} ORDER BY FILE_LEVEL ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE STYLE SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE STYLE_NO = #{sno} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY (REPLY_NO, REPLY_WRITER, REPLY_CONTENT, STYLE_NO) VALUES(SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL, #{replyWriter}, #{replyContent}, #{refSno})
mapper.update: UPDATE STYLE SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE STYLE_NO = #{sno}
UPDATE STYLE SET STYLE_CONTENT = #{styleContent} WHERE STYLE_NO = #{styleNo}
